title: ENSIFERUM & KORPIKLAANI Announce Co-Headlining North American Tour
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 1 day ago
text: Ensiferum and Korpiklaani will hit the road in 2025 for a co-headlining North American tour featuring Trollfest and NiNi as support. The trek runs from February 27 in Boston, MA through March 30 in Brooklyn, NY. Tickets are available here. "Hi folks! It's been way too long since we rocked with our North American brothers and sister but the wait is over!" said Ensiferum bassist and vocalist Sami Hinkka. "It's an honor to join forces with Korpiklaani, Trollfest, and NiNi! This tour will bring the ultimate folk metal mayhem to your city! Definitely a party you don't wanna miss. See you in the pit!" 2/27 Brighton Music Hall Boston, MA2/28 Salle Montaigne Quebec City, QC3/1 Beanfield Montreal, QC3/2 Overflow Ottawa, ON3/3 The Concert Hall Toronto, ON3/4 King Of Clubs Columbus, OH3/5 Crofoot Pontiac, MI3/6 Outset Chicago, IL3/7 Skyway Theatre Minneapolis, MN3/8 Wooly's Des Moines, IA3/9 Gothic Theatre Denver, CO3/11 Metro Music Hall Salt Lake City, UT3/13 Goldfield Roseville Sacramento, CA3/14 Great American Music Hall San Francisco, CA3/15 Regent Theater Los Angeles, CA3/16 House Of Blues San Diego, CA3/17 Nile Phoenix, AZ3/18 Sunshine Albuquerque, NM3/20 Beer City Music Hall Oklahoma City, OK3/21 Granada Dallas, TX3/22 Come And Take It Live Austin, TX3/23 Warehouse Live Houston, TX3/25 Orpheum Tampa, FL3/26 Masquerade Heaven Atlanta, GA3/27 Hangar 1819 Greensboro, NC3/28 Baltimore Soundstage Baltimore, MD3/29 Lovedraft's Mechanicsburg, PA3/30 Brooklyn Monarch Brooklyn, NY Want More Metal? html:
Ensiferum and Korpiklaani will hit the road in 2025 for a co-headlining North American tour featuring Trollfest and NiNi as support. The trek runs from February 27 in Boston, MA through March 30 in Brooklyn, NY. Tickets are available here.

"Hi folks! It's been way too long since we rocked with our North American brothers and sister but the wait is over!" said Ensiferum bassist and vocalist Sami Hinkka. "It's an honor to join forces with Korpiklaani, Trollfest, and NiNi! This tour will bring the ultimate folk metal mayhem to your city! Definitely a party you don't wanna miss. See you in the pit!"
